Package com.mesosphere.sdk.framework

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiServer
    The ApiServer runs the Jetty Server that exposes the Scheduler's API.
    Driver
    This class provides global access to a SchedulerDriver.
    EnvStore
    Utility class for grabbing values from a mapping of flag values (typically the process env).
    FrameworkConfig
    This class encapsulates global Framework settings retrieved from the environment, or from a ServiceSpec in the case of a single-Service Framework.
    FrameworkRunner
    Class which sets up and executes the correct AbstractScheduler instance.
    FrameworkScheduler
    Implementation of Mesos' Scheduler interface.
    ImplicitReconciler
    Periodically triggers implicit reconciliation of all tasks being managed by the scheduler.
    OfferProcessor
    Handles offer processing for the framework, passing offers to an underlying MesosEventClient, which itself represents one or more underlying services.
    OfferQueue
    This class acts as a buffer of Offers from Mesos.
    ProcessExit
    This class handles exiting the Scheduler process, after completed teardown or after a fatal error.
    ProcessExit.Code
    A reason for the Scheduler process to exit.
    ReviveManager
    This class determines whether offers should be revived based on changes to the work being processed by the scheduler.
    SchedulerDriverFactory
    Factory class for creating MesosSchedulerDrivers.
    TaskKiller
    This class implements reliable task killing.
    TokenBucket
    This class implements a token bucket to limit the rate at which actions may be taken.
    TokenBucket.Builder
    This class is a builder for TokenBuckets.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EnvStore.ConfigException.Type
    A machine-accessible error type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EnvStore.ConfigException
    Exception which is thrown when failing to retrieve or parse a given flag value.
